arts.ttl: “Could mean” | Huge update on West Ham star Lucas Paqueta’s alleged betting scandal
arts.sum: A major update to Lucas Paqueta’s hearing have been unveiled. A year-and-a-half on from the initial accusations and we are still no closer to knowing the truth about Lucas Paqueta’s alleged involvement in a betting scandal. The allegations claim that he purposefully got booked on three separate occasions in the Premier League. The only official... arts.ttl: “Isn’t acceptable” | West Ham players put in frustrating performance against Crystal Palace
arts.sum: West Ham’s woeful defeat to Crystal Palace shows why they desperately need another rebuild. After a couple of solid performances, it’s straight back down to reality for West Ham. Although Graham Potter has little responsibility, it would have been an extremely frustrating watch for him. Simply put, the players didn’t look up for it and... arts.ttl: Bournemouth to rival West Ham and Eintracht Frankfurt to sign Elye Wahi
arts.sum: The race to sign Marseille centre-forward Elye Wahi (22) is heating up as Bournemouth are set to rival West Ham United and Eintracht Frankfurt, according to L’Equipe. With Egyptian free-scoring…

arts.ttl: Mateta brace seals derby victory for Palace
arts.sum: After a quiet first half, Mateta - who has now scored in three consecutive Premier League matches - put Palace ahead in the 48th minute, as his low strike from outside the box out beat Lukasz Fabianski at the end of a quick break. The result was put beyond doubt late on when the West Ham goalkeeper fouled a lively Nketiah inside the box and Mateta squeezed his spot kick below a diving Fabianski to secure back-to-back road wins for Palace.

arts.ttl: Hits & misses: Nunez delivers in Liverpool's hour of need, West Ham look lost
arts.sum: Darwin Nunez - the hero of the hour for Liverpool - planted a free header wide from Andy Robertson's cross before blasting a terrible effort over the crossbar from 30 yards as it looked like the Reds were heading for a third straight league draw to start 2025 and more dropped points in the race for the Premier League title race. By setting up Mateta again, Eze has now provided eight Premier League assists for Mateta, with no Palace player assisting a team-mate more often in the competition's history.

arts.ttl: West Ham set to confirm Maxwel Cornet exit as Genoa loan deal is agreed
arts.sum: The winger’s loan spell at Southampton will be terminated

arts.ttl: Graham Potter well aware West Ham need to attack and defend better
arts.sum: Two second-half goals from Jean-Philippe Mateta, a long-range strike and a late penalty, secured a deserved 2-0 win for the Eagles.

arts.ttl: Glasner: We controlled the game – it was a great win
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner said the most pleasing aspect of Crystal Palace’s 2-0 win over West Ham United was the control his side exerted at London Stadium.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner pleased with Eddie Nketiah’s substitute impact in West Ham win
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner highlighted Eddie Nketiah’s impact off the bench in helping Crystal Palace secure their 2-0 Premier League win at West Ham on Saturday. But Nketiah made an impact at the London Stadium to help Palace seal back-to-back wins in the league for the first time this campaign, drawing Hammers stopper Lukasz Fabianski into bringing him down inside the area for Jean-Philippe Mateta to score his second of the afternoon.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner pleased with West Ham win as Crystal Palace round off perfect week
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner said his Crystal Palace side were ‘excellent’ in their 2-0 win at West Ham United on Saturday afternoon. Substitute Eddie Nketiah won Palace a penalty with three minutes of normal time remaining after being brought down by Fabianski as he looked to round the West Ham stopper, with Mateta converting to wrap up all three points for the South Londoners.
